name: flex-living-backend
description: Backend API for Flex Living Reviews Dashboard

scripts.build-and-start-local: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Push-Location '..\frontend'; npm install; npm run build; Pop-Location; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '.\build' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force '..\frontend\build' '.\build'; npm install; npm start"
